original_text: We could have told you to give us what we needed. We have authority to do that. But we wanted to show you how to live properly. Then you could copy our example.
korean_text: 우리에게 권리가 없는 것이 아니요 오직 스스로 너희에게 본을 보여 우리를 본받게 하려 함이니라

sentences.original_text: to give us what we needed
We have authority to do that
But we wanted to show you
Then you could copy our example
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희가 우리의 본을 따를 수 있었을 것이다
